website_summaries.verdict: A great starter snare that comes with everything you need. We just wish the stand were a little taller.
pros: Comes with case, sticks, and practice pad
Also comes with 30-inch stand for use when playing while seated
cons: Few complaints about the drum itself, but many wish the stand were taller

customer_reviews.title: The stand is too short even for a 4ft tall kid.
customer_reviews.text: As a starter kit for beginner student, this should work. Drum comes with practice rubber cover, sticks, stand, key and vinyl canvas case. However, the stand is too short even for my 4ft tall son. I had to return this set and upgrade him to the pearl set that's sturdier, has full size stand and a rolling case.
customer_reviews.author: VeeYaa

customer_reviews.title: perfect practice snare and sticks but stand is only 28 inches tall!! is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: My12 yr old son is in middle school band and although has a nice full accustic drum set, it was too nice to take the snare to school, so we bought this. The snare and sticks are perfect but for some reason the stand was way too short, maybe appropriate for a 4-8 year old kid, only 28 inches? my husband had to modify it and then we ordered just a stand that much taller and could telescope for perfect height. The snar is just perfect for school and home practice but know that the stand is one height and is very short.
customer_reviews.author: E. Skov

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drum for my daughter. She loves it, and plays everyday after I installed it. It arrives in a compact package, and was very easy installation. Compared to other drums on amazon, this drum is affordable and with good quality, my daughter love the sound, both when play it gently and strong. The outlook is also very cool, smooth and elegant. Overall, my daughter reviews the drum as the best gift she received this year! I have recommended this snare drum to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Zhao

customer_reviews.title: The Quality of The Product I Believe In Presemtation And Deliver Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The ADM Student Snare Drum Set was very poor in Quality. I was very disappointed. When it arrived the drum pad was damaged and looked used. It contained scratches and the rubber was worn as though it had been preowned. The stand was not reliable and after trying to stand it up several times it was not stable. The stand was also too short. Very disappointed in the product would not recommend to buyers Find another quality set this was just Aweful! This did not arrive as promised.
customer_reviews.author: D Howard

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great but the bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall you cant beat the price. The drum, stand, drum cover and sticks are what they are. Great. The BAG is a different story. That thing broke on day 2. I dont mean the zipper either. The bags stitches actually tore apart. My daughter has to put her drum in the bag and carry the bag. The straps to carry on your back never worked right from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good drum for beginner!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me she wanted to learn play drum,so I bought this for her. The quality of the drum and rack is very good. The sound is loud and nice as with 10 drum ears. There are enough accessories including silence pad and 2 drum sticks,which is perfect for beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! From a beginner
customer_reviews.text: OK, I have never drummed before, I just wanted a little snare to hit on. This in my opinion is a perfect setup for the price. I am having so much fun, and the carrying bag and stand are really good quality. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AndyK

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the backpack straps!
customer_reviews.text: We got the drum Sunday, it seems ok itself. The stand was kind of klutzy when setting it up, folding it. Not easy for me let alone my 10 year old. Both of the straps of the backpack ripped off as he was entering class yesterday, the day after we received it! Luckily he caught the drum before it fell to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: a great snare with unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an ok snare for the sale price but I am impressed. It looks and sounds great. Easy to tune! When you consider price, it is unbeatable. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beginners band
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. It was bought for my beginners band student the only issue was the stand was too short for the teachers requirements. If you have to stand to play you will need another stand.
customer_reviews.author: heidi ponds

customer_reviews.title: great starter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old that was starting drum lessons. Nice sturdy beginner drum. He brings it to school before his lesson. The bag did eventually rip, was able to fix it with some superglue and talented sewing. So just be aware it will rip if you are using the bag as a back pack on a regular basis. Music teacher suggested getting different sticks as these were "too light". Makes a great sound without being overwhelming. Very please as it would have cost me $30 a month to rent one. Much more economical to just purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Regan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING snare MUST buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This snare is amazing! It is very sturdy and good quality it’s great for beginners! It has a great crisp sound and has a great price! It comes assembled all you have to do is set up the stand which is super easy! I do not regret buying this item at all!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: The bag is very cheap quality!
customer_reviews.text: The bag that the drums are in is very cheap and fell apart. My daughter almost dropped her drumset. For the cost I would think the bag would have at least been double stitched. The drum set is nice and she likes it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: D. Myers

customer_reviews.title: You will have to buy a better bag
customer_reviews.text: The drum is nice but the material from the bag it comes with is horrible, it ripped in so many places the sticks and stand keep falling out the bag the stitching and material is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality drum, perfect for students.
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to the local music store (around half the price) and I'm completely satisfied with the quality of the drum, stand and practice pad. The only major difference between this and the one at the music store is the aesthetic look of the bag/case that it comes in, which is not as nice looking as the one from the music store, but my son has hauled it back and forth between school and home and it has held together just fine. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: bang the drum slowly...it's great!
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely drum set. Absolutely stunning. I discovered that I am more of a big drum person so I donated it to 89.7 in Wake Forest, NC and hope some inspired young musician enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drum pad stinks
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber drum pad is all cracked in the middle..otherwise the drum is great..you might want to buy better quality drumsticks.these are pretty cheap..but otherwise great little drum.i bought for my 8yr old daughter to start learning on a real drum.it awesome
customer_reviews.author: Dianna P.

customer_reviews.title: Drum kit is good, but the case is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Drum kit is good, but the case is poor quality. Straps broke in 1 week, had to buy a replacement case. A few months later and the stand is broken. If you are liking this item based on the package, you may be better off buying the drum and case separately.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: reasonable price for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I gat this for my son, he love it and been playing and watching video on youtube to learn how to play it lol. this gat him off from watching Ipad all day. i love the price on this drum and the quality. and it come with a zip bag to carry it around. the drum come with a adjustable stand too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin chen

customer_reviews.title: Good Drum, Bad Stand
customer_reviews.text: The drum, itself, is nice. My son is happy with the sound and the practice pad does a good job of muting the noise. I’ll probably end up buying a different stand because the one that came with the set is very short and it’s not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beginner drum
customer_reviews.text: Descent drum for a beginner. However, the carry bag has already tore at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Neuby

customer_reviews.title: Drums are cool but the cover, not so cool
customer_reviews.text: It's good for a starter set. The straps on the case broke off the first day of my sons band class, so just know that the covers are not made to last long at all especially if your child walks or catches the bus to school. Word of advice, you can purchase covers for this product separately.
customer_reviews.author: Tee S.

customer_reviews.title: Snare is okay, the snare lever is a "cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Snare is okay, the snare lever is a "cost effective" design. My issue is the stand does not go high enough for a 10 year old to stand and play at the proper heights. I think maybe I had higher hopes for this product.
customer_reviews.author: NDillon

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This set up easy, had a nice soft practice pad with it. Works great, nice bag to carry it in
customer_reviews.author: Teri R

customer_reviews.title: Not for good drummers
customer_reviews.text: My son is learning drums and we ordered this for his Christmas program because his is an old one. This is not musician quality. Might be ok for a fun beater but it doesn’t hold a tune and I couldn’t just updated the one he has for less money. But you do get the pad and sticks and all the goodies so it’s a fun 1st snare to play with
customer_reviews.author: BoxMomma40

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: This snare drum set is great for beginners. It is well made and has good sound. Easy to put together, easy to tune and very appealing to eye. Great value that comes with a case and sticks.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Good sound comes from it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 10 year old sister who went ballistic when she received she was so excited. She started playing right away. Good sound comes from it, it is pretty sturdy great for a student.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap materials and isn’t worth the money. Was completely unable to use after the first 5 days. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 12 year old son who is in band. It is just as promised and the quality appears good. For the price thus was a great deal and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Yoerges

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The set had a horrible chemical smell that caused headaches immediately. Had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st drum
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our son to take back and forth to school. The case did not last
customer_reviews.author: Dan Calderbank

customer_reviews.title: great product, happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Snare drum set works well, arrived as expected. great product, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a first year percussion student and loves this set. Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pizzimenti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super good drum for starter. The kids like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Feng Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Just OK product. Buy another bag and stand.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper in the bag breaks off easily. The stand is badly built and very difficult to adjust and requires a lot of effort. The drum otherwise is fine.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and sound. My 11 year old has had a blast with this drum.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Per music teacher, would not hold tight to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Per music teacher, would not hold tight to play correct sound, the bag ripped day one, the stand was very short.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with drums. Carrying case lasts 1 week and than tears.
customer_reviews.text: Drums themselves are great. Stand is way to short and the bag is cheaply made and tears within the first week. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: BELI (:

customer_reviews.title: Great drum
customer_reviews.text: My son is a beginner and this drum is light and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta Heyliger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old son who is just starting out playing the drum in school. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Robovitsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue color and perfect beginner set, worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sidney

customer_reviews.title: this is a student snare drum
customer_reviews.text: easily adjustable and good sound with the pad. nice carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: sara trachsel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than promised! My kids is so excited to use it. Looks sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: My son is satisfied with it in band class
customer_reviews.text: My son is satisfied with it in band class ,it's the same thing everyone else has. Can't beat the price either, last year I rented a set and paid more than double for the drums.
customer_reviews.author: ebony k roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great snare, plenty loud. Just go agead and order a replacement head as the one included didnt’t last me one night.
customer_reviews.author: South Houston Renovations

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product to any one
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality bag ripped within 2 weeks, drum stand does not hold drum set. Drum keeps sliding down . Would not recommend this product to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old's first instrument. Seems to be working well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lunt

customer_reviews.title: Very Good drum and the sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Very Good drum and the sound is great. I got it for my 8 year old nephew this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Whitley Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Drum great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Stand bent, strap didn't carry the weight, Drum great sound.
customer_reviews.author: cora j.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and school. No complaints as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this snare to help my little nephew (age 4) with his drum lessons. I know very little about music, so this works great for me. I particularly like the rubber test piece. It decreases the noise a 4 year can make. Good price for the bundle - individually it would cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: OldDancer

customer_reviews.title: Earplugs Not Included!
customer_reviews.text: Brought two of these for my two grandsons and they started playing them Christmas morning (fortunately we had earplugs!, LOL). Seriously though, seem to be very good instruments and glad I made the purchases. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Cline II

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this drum
customer_reviews.text: Comes tuned and with a key to tune them. Very happy with this drum. It has a nice popping sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This is not for a student who needs to stand ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not for a student who needs to stand at the snare for band class or concerts. It is far too short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The drum has good quality and it's very easy to set up it.There is a practice pad which can avoid noisy,that's very good.My sons are very excited to play it,it brings so much fun to them.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Everything fits nicely in the bag. Easy to break down and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - a great starter drum for my son
customer_reviews.text: Nice product - a great starter drum for my son. I will build off of this one for a set. All of the extra equipment are good quality and the drum itself is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for you elementary school child who wants to try Band.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Matson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my nephew and he loves them! They exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: kamilah Eason-Price

customer_reviews.title: A kid again
customer_reviews.text: It makes me feel like a kid again. But maybe I'll be more interested in practicing.
customer_reviews.author: patricia boelsing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was my first drum and it's really fun to play
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for a friend. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: This perfect for a starting drummer
customer_reviews.text: This perfect for a starting drummer, particularly if they are just trying to figure out if drums are for them. Sending this so quickly. Everything was in tact and work great.
customer_reviews.author: gunnerliao

customer_reviews.title: This came so FAST! I've only monkeyed around with ...
customer_reviews.text: This came so FAST! I've only monkeyed around with it, but it works perfectly for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: toxpro62

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Drum was perfect for our 9yr old son. He has had a great time with it. Well made drum!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Triquana

customer_reviews.title: five Star
customer_reviews.text: The drum is good quality. I spoke to customers service regarding the stand. It is short however if you read the measurements you can order one that works for you. Customer service was fantastic and happy to help. I highly recommend this drum set.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kruse

product_meta.title: ADM Student Snare Drum Set with Gig Bag, Sticks, Stand & Practice Pad Kit, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackADM student snare drum set with case, sticks, stand and practice pad kit.
feature_bullets: ♬ pad case sticks and stand included
♬ Note: the stand is 2.5 ft tall. It's standard SIZE stand for players to sit by. With strap, you can also play Our durm without sit. Affordable way to start playing
♬ 14"x 5" Steel snare drum with hairline nickel finish - a high quality, sensitive, and responsive drum for a positive student experience on a full size drum

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
